text: The 2017 Big Ten Men's Lacrosse Tournament was held May 4 and May 6 at Jesse Owens Memorial Stadium in Columbus, Ohio. The winner of the tournament received the Big Ten Conference's automatic bid to the 2017 NCAA Division I Men's Lacrosse Championship. Four teams from the Big Ten conference competed in the single elimination event. The seeds were determined based upon the teams' regular season conference record. Maryland repeated as tournament champions, beating Ohio State 10-9. ==Standings== Only the top four teams in the Big Ten Conference advanced to the Big Ten Conference Tournament. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Seed !School !Conference !Overall |- |1 |align=left|Maryland ‡ |4-1 ||12–3 |- |2 |align=left|Ohio State |3–2 ||13-4 |- |3 |align=left|Johns Hopkins |3–2 ||8–6 |- |4 |align=left|Penn State |3–2 ||12–3 |- |DNQ |align=left|Rutgers |2–3 ||10–4 |- |DNQ |align=left|Michigan |0–5 ||8–6 |- | colspan=4 align=left|‡ Big Ten regular season champions. |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" !Session !Game !Time !Matchup !Score !Television |- !colspan=6| Semifinals – Thursday, May 4 |- |rowspan=2 align=center|1 |align=center|1 |align=right|5:00 pm |align=center|#1 Maryland vs. #4 Penn State |align=center|8-6 |rowspan=1 align=center|Big Ten Network |- |align=center|2 |align=right|7:30 pm |align=center|#2 Ohio State vs #3 Johns Hopkins |align=center|15-13 |rowspan=1 align=center|Big Ten Network |- !colspan=6| Championship – Saturday, May 6 |- |rowspan=1 align=center|2 |align=center|3 |align=right|7:30 pm |align=center|#1 Maryland vs. #2 Ohio State |align=center|10-9 |rowspan=1 align=center|Big Ten Network |- |colspan=6| Game times in EST |} ==Bracket== Jesse Owens Memorial Stadium – Columbus, Ohio ==References== Category:2017 NCAA Division I men's lacrosse season Big Ten Conference Men's Lacrosse Category:Big Ten Men's Lacrosse Tournament
